name: GoGodotJam1.0(DinoDash)
description:
Small Tip since first stage starts off relatively difficult: swap to yellow as soon as possible! :) (#3 key!) Otherwise hope you enjoy my first ever Godot experience ♥

Controls:

  • Move = arrows or WASD 
  • Jump/double-jump = Space-bar
  • (Green exclusive skill) Sprint = hold f with movement
  • (Blue exclusive skill) Crouch = regular movement in blue form
  • (Yellow exclusive skill) Wall climb =keep jumping along a wall

Change Dino form + abilities (keyboard number keys 1-4):

  • #1 Key(green) - can sprint with f!
  • #2 Key(blue) - can crouch/crawl when moving
  • #3 Key(yellow)- can wall jump
  • #4 Key (red - sadly no special skill bonus if you reach end early i guess :)

CREDITS:

Dino Art = Itch.io(Arks) / Twiiter (@ScissorMarks)

Lab Sheet = Itch.io (ExceptRea)

Music = Sounds from Zapsplat.com
